keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for our hospital to ensure services at our local hospital are maintained and its funding is protected.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives can't win here, they are out of the race.

issues.health: Our hospital is under threat. EITHER Labour win and will cut services at our local hospital OR Jo Crotty will be our new Liberal Democrat MP and will fight for our hospital.

images.caption: Image of Dr Jo Crotty with the text: 'Have Your Say - Bring This Petition to the Polling Station with you on Thursday'

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet asks supporters to bring a petition to the polling station and to drop the petition in the Liberal Democrat Orange Box outside the polling station when they go to vote for Dr Jo Crotty.
